resources.string: Umtsetfo Wemgwaco
Timphawu Temgwaco
Timphawu Letisiphocelelako/Letisicondzisako
Timphawu Letisicaphelisako
Timphawu Letikwatisako
Timphawu Letidvwetjwephansi
Timphawu Letidvwetjwephansi
Yini umtsetfo wekucala?
Kuhamba ngesencele semgwaco.
Ngubani sipidi lohamba ngaso?
Lesivumelana nendzawo lengihamba kuyo.
Uma kwendlula bantfu netilwane wenta njani?
Ngibuka sibuko, ngime, ngitinike litfuba lekwendlula.
Ngukuphi lapho kufanele ushayele ngekucophelela khona?

i. Engkhungwini 
ii. Nalina 
iii. Umakushelela 
iv. Etfulwini 
v. Ebusuku
Uma ufuna ku-overtheka wentanjani?

i. Ngibuka ngemuva - ngesibuko, ngibuke phambili 
ii. Ngibuke kutsi timphawu temgwaco tiyavuma yini 
iii. Ngiphindze ngibuke sibuko, ngitenetise kutsi kuhlobile 
iv. Ngi-indikhethe ngesekudla, bese ngiya ovatheka 
v. Bese ngibuka sibuko ngesencele, ngi-indikhethe ngesencele, bese ngibuyela esayidini lami lekushayela
Ngutiphi tindzawo lapho unga-ovatheki khona, letisikhombisa (7)?

i. Cross-road 
ii. Edvundvuni 
iii. Ebhulohweni lelincane 
iv. Lapho kuwela khona betinyawo 
v. Ema-robhothini 
vi. Emakhoneni lacijile 
vii. Ku t-junction
U-ovathekha ngakuphi?
Ngasekudla
Kuvumeleke nini ku-ovatheka ngesencele?
Uma losembikwakho akhombisa kutsi ujikela ngasekudla ku-oneway, ubitwa liphoyisa netisebenti temgwaco.
Usitana kanjani nebashayeli labanye?
Ngisitana ngekutsi konkhe lengifuna kukwenta emgwacweni ngisheshe ngikukhombise.
Yini lokufanele kuhlale kulungile emotweni?

i. Emathayi 
ii. i-windscreen 
iii. ema-wiper 
iv. steering 
v. i-hooter 
vi. ema-indikhetha 
vii. ema-layitha 
viii. ema-bhiliki 
ix. tibuko (rearview, nasemaceleni) 
x. ema-bhandi
Uma udibana nalenye imoto ebusuku wenta njani?
Ngiyadima noma angangidimeli lona lomunye umshayeli, ngihambe kancane ngicophelele.
Uma utfwele umtfwalo ugabanca eligebezini wenta njani?
i. Ngilengisa i-triangle lebovu ngemuva ebusuku \nii. ngibophe indvwangu lebovu emini
Unga ovatheka yini ku-barrier line?
Angeke, noma chake.
Ungapaka yini ku-yellow line?
Chake, awukavumeleki.
Ngutiphi tindzawo letisihlanu lapho kumele ukhanyise khona emini?

i. Umalina kakhulu 
ii. Uma kunetintfuli 
iii. Ethoneleni 
iv. Enkhungwini 
v. Kanye nase ntfuftwini
Imphumphutse uyibona ngani?
Iphatsa indvuku lemhlophe, noma idvonswe ngumuntfu, noma iholwe yinja lefundzisiwe.
Sisindvo bani imoto noma i-lorry yakho?
Imoto lencane ingu 3.5 tonne, kantsi i-lorry ingu 7 tonne.
Uyibona ngani imoto lenkhulu uma ijuba embikwakho ebusuku?
Ngiyibona ngema reflectors la-yellow emaceleni.
Uma udibana nayo ebusuku ubona ngani kutsi yinkhulu?
Ngibona ngemalambu laluhlata etulu.
Uma uya ku-cross road ebusuku wenta njani?
Ngiyadima, ngibrithe, nginciphise litubane ngentele umshayeli lotako abone
Umehluko wemoto lenkhulu nalencane yini?

i. Lenkhulu ihamba kancane, ikakhulu etindzaweni letenyukelako; kufanele wena lohamba ngalelenkhulu ukhweshele eceleni kutowendlula lelencane. 
ii. Lenkhulu inema reflectors la-yellow emhlubulweni, kantsi lencane ite. 
iii. Lenkhulu inemalambu laluhlata ngembhili etulu, kantsi lencane ingaba nema reflectors lamuhlophe ngembhili. 
iv. Lenkhulu inesisindvo lesehlukile kulencane. 
v. Lenkhulu inema-chevron belt ngemuva, kantsi lencane ingaba nema "stripes" labovu namutfubi ngemuva.
Imoto iphelelwa ngemabhiliki, njenga lapha kuMalagwane, kumelewente njani?
i. Ngishaya ihutha, \nii. Ngikhanyise ingakacali kubaleka, \niii. Ngiyikhweshisele eceleni khona itosima evalini.
Ngukuphi lapho ungakafaneli ushaye khona i-hooter?

i. Ebukhosini 
ii. Esikolweni 
iii. Esibhedlela 
iv. Ku-zebra crossing 
v. Emarobothini 
vi. Laphokuwela betinyawo khona
Ngutiphi timoto letiniketwa indlela emgwacweni?

i. yi-ambulance (uma ishaya i-siren) 
ii. temaphoyisa (uma tishaya i-siren) 
iii. temasotja (uma tishaya i-siren) 
iv. temlilo (uma tishaya i-siren)
Ngumaphi emasayini latfolakala uma uya ebhulohweni lelincane?

i. Awu ovatheki 
ii. Umgwaco uyancipha ngasekudla nangasencele 
iii. Sakhiwo semoto yinye ebhulohweni 
iv. Luphawu lokuniketa indlela 
v. Bongcwengcwe bengoti ebhulohweni
Ngumaphi emasayini lotfolakala uma uya lapho kuphela khona i-freeway?
i. Kuphela kwe-freeway \nii. Umgwaco uyancipha ngasekudla ngangesencele \niii. i-traffic iyaphambana
Shano umtsetfo wemgwaco ube mune (4)

i. Uhamba ngesencele 
ii. Awuhambi ngesekudla ngoba ungadala ingoti 
iii. Awuhambi ngesekudla uma timphawu temgwaco tingavumi 
iv. Ungahamba ngesekudla uma ubitwa ngemaphoyisa
Ushayisa umuntfu emaphandleni, uyalimala, akafi, kumele wente njani?

i. Ngiyehla emotweni, ngiye kulomuntfu, ngimunikete lusito lwekucala 
ii. Bese, ngiya lapho ngicale khona kubhilika nalapho awele khona, ngifike ngidvwebe noma ngibophe tjani, kucondzane letindzawo letimbili 
iii. Bese, ngiyamtsatsa ngimphutfumisa esibhedlela, 
iv. Bese, ngiyobikela emphoyisa kungakapheli 24-hours
Kudzingeke nini kutsi uphatse ilayisensi yakho?
Ngasosonkhe sikhatsi.
Kudzingeke nini kutsi ukhiphe ilayisensi yakho?
Uma ubitwa liphoyisa lelinesiciniseko sebuphoyisa.
Ngubani sikhatsi sekukhanyisa emalambu ntsambama?
Ngikhanyisa emalambu ema-minutes lamashumi lamatsatfu emuva kwekushona kwelilanga.
Uwacisha nini emalambu ekuseni?
Ngiwacisha sekusele ema-minutes lamashumi lamatsatfu kutsi lilanga liphume.
Ukhanyisa emalambu uma ungasaboni sigaba lesinganani?
Ngikhanyisa uma ngingasaboni sigaba lesi ma-metre lamashumi lalishumi nema shumi lasihlanu (150m).
Uma ulayishe tintfo letigabancako ngebudze kufanele tigabance kanganani?

i. Kufanele ngemuva tingendluli emitheni lolulunye, nema centimetre lamashumi lasiphohlongo (1.8m), 
ii. Ngembili tingengci kuma-centimetre lamashumi lamatsatfu (30cm) 
iii. Emaceleni kube ngema-centimetre lalishumi nesihlanu (15cm) 
iv. Noma tingendluli ema-metre lamabili, nema-centimetre lamashumi lasihlanu (2.5m)
Ema-reflectors emotweni lencane ehlukene kangakhi?
Ahlukene kabili (2): \ni. Kunalabovu ngemuva \nii. Nalamhlophe ngembili
Ema-reflectors emotweni lenkhulu ehlukene kangakhi?

Ahlukene katsatfu (3): 
i. Kunala yellow emaceleni 
ii. Kunalabovu ngemuva 
iii. Nalamhlophe ngembili
Sipidi bani lofanele uhambe ngaso nase utofika edolobheni?
Ngifanele ngihambe nga 60km/h
Spidi bani lofanele uhambe ngaso ekhatsi edolobheni?
Ngihambisana ne-traffic lengiyilandzelako.
Tehlukene kangakhi timphawu temgwaco?

Tehlukene kane (4): 
i. Timphawu leticondzisako/letiphocelelako 
ii. Timphawu leticwayisako/leticaphelisako 
iii. Timphawu tekwatisa 
iv. Timphawu letidvwetjwe phasi, emgwacweni
Mangakhi emakhona e-stop sign?
Asiphohlongo/Angu 8
Ngubani sipidi lesikhulu saka Ngwane?
Ngifanele ngihambe ngemashumi lalishumi wema-kilometre ngeli hour (100km/h).
Yini lokufanele kuhlale kulungile ku-bonnet

i. i-engine oil 
ii. i-brake fluid 
iii. ngemanti 
iv. i-fan belt (kutsi ite emakrete) 
v. emabattery terminals (kutsi acinile)
Tintfo letingadzingeki ku-free way?

i. Tilwane 
ii. Tilwane letidonsa tinkalishi 
iii. Bantfu betinyawo 
iv. Tigulumba 
v. Labagibele emabhayisikili 
vi. Tidududu letingaphansi kwa-50cc (50 cubic cm) 
vii. ema-hand signal sign 
viii. Kuhamba kancane
Imoto uma ifile idonswa ngani?

i. Uma lemoto ife emabhiliki, uyidonsa ngensimbi lecinile, lengema-metre lamatsatfu, kanye nema-centimetre lamashumi lasihlanu (3.5m). \nii. Uma emabhiliki asebenta uyidonsa ngendophi noma i-chain leli-metre kanye nema-centimetre lamashumi lasiphohlongo (1.8m), khona lolandzelako anganufuna ku-ovatheka, atitjele kutsi utawungena emkhatsini wenu.
Shano umehluko we-free way ne-one way ubemune (4)?

One-Way	vs	Free-way 
i. Imizila mibili	vs	imizila mitsatfu, nome miningi 
ii. Iba edolobheni	vs	Iba emaphandleni 
iii. Ku netikhinyabeto	vs	Kute tikhinyabeto 
iv. Umshayeli u-controlwa yitraffic	vs	Umshayeli uhamba ngelitubane lelikhulu
Shano tintfo lekumele tihlale tikhona ebhuthini?

i. ngu jeke 
ii. i-triangle lebovu 
iii. spare wheel 
iv. i-wheel spanner 
V. i-chain 
vi. i-tool box
Umtsetfo uba nebubele kuwe uma ushayise umuntfu wafa nini?
Uma ngabe utfwele bantfu labaningi emotweni wangakhoni kuvika lona loyedvwa.
Bhala tindzawo tibe sikhombisa (7) lapho kutfola khona i-barrier line?

i. Ebhulohweni lelincane 
ii. Edvundvwini 
iii. Emakhoneni lacijile 
iv. Esichingini 
v. Ku t-junction 
vi. Ku-zebra crossing 
vii. Ku-cross road
Imoto uma ikhanyise bright, ubona sigaba lesinganani?
Ubona sigaba lesingema metre lama shumi lalishumi (100m).
Uma udimile ikhanyisa kanganani?
Uma udimile ikhanyisa sigaba lesingema metre lamashumi lamane nasihlanu (45m).
Ubona ngani nawuyongena edolobheni?
Ngibona ngeli-board lelibhalwe kutsi “Welcome To {Lelidoloba}”.
Umasewuphuma edolobheni ubona ngani?
Ngibona ngeli-board lelibhalwe kutsi “Thank you/Siyabonga”.
Ngutiphi tintfo temtimba letimcoka nawushayelako?

i. Ngemehlo 
ii. Tindlebe 
iii. Tandla 
iv. Tinyawo 
v. Nengcondvo
Ihutha ikhala umgamu longanani?
Ikhala ema-metre langemashumi layimfica.
Ngubani sipidi longasisebentisa kuhamba ngaso uma udonsa lenye imoto?
Uhamba ngema kilometre lamashumi lamatsatfu ngeli hour (30km/h).
Shano tintfo tibe sihlanu (5) letitsintfwa ngumshayeli esitelingini nakashayela?

i. i-hooter 
ii. Ngema indicators 
iii. Ngema lambu 
iv. Ngema hazard switch 
v. Ngema wipers
Yini emehlo akati?
Emehlo akati ngema reflectors lanyatsiselwa emgwacweni, lapho kutekhona ema-street lights.
Ehlukene kangakhi wona lamehlo akati?

Ehlukene katsatfu: 
i. Kunala bovu; amele ibarrier line 
ii. Kunala mhlophe; amele i-centre line 
iii. Kunala yellow; amele i-yellow line
Yini ihazard?
Yintfo lengakuphazamisa emgwacweni.
Ihlukene kangakhi yona ihazard?
Yehlukene kabili (2): \ni. Kunale hambako (e.g. bantfu, tilwane, etc) \nii. Kunale ngahambi (e.g. potholes, ematje, tihlahla, tikotela, etc)
Ibhasi uma igcwele uyibona ngani?
Ngelibhodi lelibekwa ngembili lelibhalwe kutsi full/vol.
Ngubani i-code yemoto lencane kanye nalenkhulu?
i. Lencane (light) ngu-8 \nii. Lenkhulu (heavy) ngu-10
Imoto uma itfole ingoti yalimala ngembili uyidonsa ngani?
Ngisebentisa i-breakdown letoyiphakamisa.
Uma ulandzela imoto uyilandzela sigaba lesinganani?
Tigaba letintsatfu te-centre line.
Uma ujikela ku-one way ujikela njani?
Ujikela ku-lane yalesandla lajikela kuso lomgwaco, ngesencele noma ngesekudla.
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngime
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngime lwaka customs
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngime lwema phoyisa
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi siniketane indlela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi akungenwa umgwaco uyi one-way
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi tilwane letidvonsa tincola atikavumeleki
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi bemabhayisikili abaka vumeleki
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi betidudu abaka vumeleki
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angijikeli ngesencele
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angiyenti i-u-turn
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angi ovatheki
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angipaki lapha
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angimi lapha
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angipaki ngetikhatsi letibhaliwe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angimi ngetikhatsi letibhaliwe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angipaki/angimi ngetikhatsi letibhaliwe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako ngekuphakama lokuvumelekile lokungema-metre lamane, kanye nema centimetre lamashumi lamane nakubili (4.42m)
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angihambi ngetulu kwema-kilometre lamashumi lasitfupha ngeli hour (60km/h)
Luphawu lolungicondzisako ngesisindvo semoto lesivumelekile lesima-tonne lasihlanu (5t)
Luphawu lolungicondzisako ngesisindvo se-axle lesivumelekile lesima-tonne lamabili (2t)
Luphawu lolungicondzisako ngekutsi umgwaco uvaliwe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngihambe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angigcine ngesencele kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angicondze ngesencele kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angicondze ngesekudla kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angicondze embili kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngingajikela ngesekudla kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngingajikela ngesencele kuphela
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi angihambi ngephansi kwema-kilometre lamashumi lasihlanu ngeli hour (50km/h)
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi kuhamba bemabhayisikili kuphela kulomzila
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi kuhamba emabhansi kuphela kulomzila ngetikhatsi letibhaliwe
Luphawu lolungicondzisako kutsi ngingapaka ema-minutes lamashumi lamane nesihlanu (45min) ngetikhatsi letibhaliwe
Luphawu loluphakanyisiwe ku-free way, lolungicondzisako ngemzila lengingahambi kuwo kwesikhashana
Luphawu loluphakanyisiwe ku-free way, lolungicondzisako ngemzila lengingamusebentisa kwesikhashana

Caphela umgwaco ungu-T
Caphela umgwaco uhluka ngalokucondzile ngesencele
Caphela umgwaco uhluka ngekushiyashiyana ngesencele, nangesekudla
Caphela umgwaco ungena ngalokucijile ngesencele
Caphela umgwaco uhluka ngalokucijile ngasekudla
Caphela umgwaco longenela ngalotjekile
Caphela umgwaco ungu-Y
Caphela indingilizi ye-traffic
Caphela lijika lelibekele ngasekudla
Caphela likona lelicijile ngesekudla
Caphela umgwaco unelijika lelisa hairpin
Caphela umgwaco umajikojiko
Caphela umgwaco unemakona lahlalelene ngesencele, nangesekudla
Caphela umgwaco uyaphela kubangumphacambili ngesencele
Caphela umgwaco uyacala kubangumphacambili ngesekudla

Caphela umgwaco uyancipha ngesencele

Caphela emabhadvubhadvu ekuwela bantfu

Caphela bemabhayisikili
Caphela tinkhomo
Caphela emahhashi
Caphela timvu
Caphela tilwane tasendle
Caphela emabhampi lentwe mabomu
Caphela ematje langahle awe ngesekudla
Caphela umgwaco uyashelela
Caphela litubuko
Caphela lugu lwemfula
Caphela kuphakama lokunemkhawulo
Caphela ligede longalivula phindze ulivale
Caphela ligede laphansi ngesencele
Caphela ligede laphansi emkhatsini
Caphela sakhiwo semoto yinye
Caphela lithonela
Caphela jantji wesitimela longagadvwa
Caphela umgwaco uyewukela ngesekudla
Caphela umgwaco uyenyukela ngesekudla
Caphela umoya lojubako
Caphela ema-robot
Caphela longakumisa endlulise besikolo
Caphela emaloli lajubako emgwacweni
Caphela tigulumba letakha umgwaco
Caphela umgwaco ulukhetse
Caphela locontrolla i-traffic
Caphela longakumisa phindze akwendlulise
Caphela labakha umgwaco
Caphela lilambu lengoti yesikhashana
Lungatisa ngemugabanco munye wesitimela
Lungatisa ngemigabanco lemibili nome ngetulu yesitimela
Lungatisa ngemgwaco loyi-one way, locondze ngesencele
Lungatisa ngemgwaco loyi-one way, locondze ngesekudla
Lungatisa ngemgwaco loyi-one way, locondze embili
Lungatisa ngekucala kwe-free way
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola indzawo yekupaka
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesencele ngitfola indzawo yekuphumula
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola siteshi setindiza lesincane
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola belusito lwekucala noma sibhedlela
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola lihhovisi lekwatisa tivakashi
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola indzawo yekupaka i-caravan
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola indzawo yekugcumeka emathende
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola indzawo yekupaka i-caravan nekugcumeka emathende
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola lihhotela lelikhulu
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola lihhotela lelikhulu
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola i-filling station neli-garage
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola i-filling station
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola indzawo yekushaya lucingo
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngitfola i-police station
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola emanti
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-kilometre lamatsatfu (3km), bese phambili ngitfola litje lesikhumbuto
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngesekudla ngitfola i-restuarant
Lungatisa ngendzawo yekwehlisa nekugibelisa tisebenti tembutfo te-South Africa
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-metre; lamashumi lamatsatfu lalishumi (300m), lamashumi lamabili lalishumi (200m), lamashumi lalishumi (100m), bese ngitfola umgwaco lohluka ngesencele, ku-freeway
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba li-kilometre (1km), bese phambili ngitfola luphawu lokuma
Lungatisa kutsi litubane belibekiwe selikhanseliwe, sengingahamba ngetulu kwalo
Lungatisa ngekuphela kwe-free way
Lungatisa ngekutsi umgwaco uyaphela ngembili
Lungatisa ngesiteshi semabhasi; alabamhlophe, alabamnyama
Lungatisa ngemncele wesifundza se-transvaal
Lungatisa ngeligama lelidolobha
Lungatisa ngeligama lemfula
Lungatisa ngekuphakama kwemsaho wentsaba lengema-metre lalishumi lamane lalishumi, nemashumi lasihlanu (450m)
Lungatisa kutsi umgwaco uyasetjentwa ngembili
Lungatisa ngenombolo yemgwaco lomkhulu ku-free way
Lungatisa ngenombolo yemgwaco lomncane
Lungatisa ngenombolo yemgwaco lomkhulu lohlanganisa tifundza
Lungatisa ngenombolo yemgwaco lomkhulu emangweni
Lungatisa ngenombolo yemgwaco lomncane
Lungatisa ngesigwacwana lesicondze embili
Lungatisa ngesigwacwana lesicondze ngesencele
Lungatisa ngesigwacwana lesicondze embili nangesekudla
Lungatisa ngesigwacwana lesicondze ngesencele nangasekudla
Lungatisa ngesigwacwana lesicondze embili nangasencele
Lungatisa ngekutsi bayabonga
Lungatisa kutsi ngitohamba ema-metre lalishumi lalishumi, nemashumi lasihlanu (150m) uphele umgwaco wesikhashana
